description: This recipe makes a ganache suitable for filling chocolatesor layering cakes. Once you’ve mastered this basic technique, experiment with different flavours and textures.
name: Ganache Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g goodquality dark chocolate, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Gently heat the cream in a saucepan over a low heat. Do not allow it to come to the boil.
Remove the saucepan from the heat and add the chocolate a few pieces at a time. Stir well with a silicone spatula.
When the chocolate has completely melted into the cream to create a smooth ganache, transfer it into a bowl.
Allow the ganache to cool in the fridge for approximately 1 hour before using it. You can store the ganache, covered, in the fridge for up to 1 week.
